T02D2445:74a-1: mah'a mu dra ratn'a bhi g'i ta au pa de sha n'a ma /
T02D2445:74b-0: phyag rgya chen po rin po che @74b brda'i man ngag ces bya ba /
T02D2445:74b-1: dpal 'khor lo bde mchog la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2445:74b-2: au rgyan tstsha ndo ha'i gling du mkha' 'gro ma
T02D2445:74b-3: dpal gyi yon tan gyis rtogs pa'i brda brjod par
T02D2445:74b-4: // au du m+w'a ra'i ge sar chu 'dam las mi 'khrungs //
T02D2445:74b-5: skyug nang can de zas kyi zhen pa bral nas
T02D2445:74b-6: 'dug / gangg'a las thar mi de sems ngal skam
T02D2445:74b-7: la so // bshes med dgras gtser ba de phyogs bzhir mgon skyabs tshol //
T02D2445:74b-8: sku yi 'bras bu 'di ni 'phel stobs rab tu che //
T02D2445:74b-11: // / shar phyogs bde ldan gyi phug par mkha' 'gro
T02D2445:74b-12: ma rdo rje nyi ma'i mig gis rtogs pa'i brda
T02D2445:74b-13: brjod pa / 'gro ba chu las gru dang gzings kyis sgrol //
T02D2445:74b-14: 'khor los brgyan pa'i shing rta sa lam gcod //
T02D2445:74b-15: so btang bum pas chu nang skol ma 'dzags //
T02D2445:74b-16: dang po'i skas gdang yang thog steng du bskyal //
T02D2445:74b-17: zhun mthar 'byongs pa'i dar gyi sa sha rus gcod //
T02D2445:74b-20: // / klu sgrub spyod kyi phug par mkha' 'gro ma
T02D2445:74b-21: gser gyi bum pa 'dzin mas rtogs pa'i brda brjod
T02D2445:74b-22: pa / nam mkha' dang ni stong gsum dbyer ma phyed //
T02D2445:74b-23: gshog gcig bya yis mkha' la 'phur ma nus //
T02D2445:74b-24: mgo dang sug pa lus po go gcig 'gyur //
T02D2445:74b-25: rdo yi gzugs 'dra'i 'khyag pa'i ngo bo chu //
T02D2445:74b-26: me long dang ni gzugs brnyan tha dad med //
T02D2445:74b-29: // /'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa'i
T02D2445:74b-30: sar mkha' 'gro ma kang ka khrag ldag mas rtogs
T02D2445:74b-32: chang gis grod pa brtol bas sngar snang 'jig /'khor los sgyur rgyal bya ba gzhan mi byed //
T02D2445:74b-33: dbul mo gter ngo shes tshe sngar spyod 'chor //
T02D2445:74b-34: gling don grub pa'i ded dpon bde bar gnas //
T02D2445:74b-37: // / grong khyer chen po rdo 'jog tu mkha' 'gro
T02D2445:74b-38: ma shva na glog gi zhags pa can gyis rtogs
T02D2445:74b-40: sna tshogs phyag rgya thal mo rang yin mod //
T02D2445:74b-41: tshi lus rkang mar sha rus khrag la brtan //
T02D2445:74b-42: nyi ma'i 'od kyis skar ma'i 'od zer bcom //
T02D2445:74b-43: chu 'dzin nang du me shel nus pa brlag / gsung ngo /
T02D2445:74b-45: // / dur khrod chen po au tsa la'i lhor mkha'
T02D2445:74b-46: 'gro ma sha za dung 'bud mas rtogs pa'i brda
T02D2445:74b-47: brjod pa / sprin lding ba la gtan sa yod ma yin /
T02D2445:74b-48: mkha' la byung ba'i rlung ni ngo bos stong //
T02D2445:75a-1: ca'i skad 'di gzhan gyi sgra la brten //
T02D2445:75a-2: smyon pa'i sems ni gza' gtad bral nas 'dug / gsung ngo /
T02D2445:75a-4: // / ri me ri 'bar ba'i khar mkha' 'gro ma
T02D2445:75a-5: glog gi ral pa can gyis rtogs pa'i brda brjod
T02D2445:75a-6: pa / rtog bral bu chung gser bor bong ba len //
T02D2445:75a-7: dus la bab pa'i myu gus sa sran 'bigs //
T02D2445:75a-8: tshon gyi dri ma chu yis dag tshe gsal //
T02D2445:75a-9: bsam pas 'grub pa 'khor los sgyur ba'i lus //
T02D2445:75a-12: // / rgyal po'i khab ser skya'i byad du mkha' 'gro
T02D2445:75a-13: ma ri'i rgya mtsho mdangs len mas rtogs pa'i brda
T02D2445:75a-14: brjod pa / mchil lham gyis ni rkang pa'i mi mthun skyob //
T02D2445:75a-15: ri gzar rbab ni mi sdod drag tu 'phar //
T02D2445:75a-16: gangg'a'i chu klung bar mtshams med par 'brel //
T02D2445:75a-17: ce spyang mig la mun pas sgrib mi nus //
T02D2445:75a-20: // / rdo rje gdan gyi byang chub chen po'i rtsar
T02D2445:75a-21: mkha' 'gro ma bde ldan mas rtogs pa'i brda brjod
T02D2445:75a-22: pa / mgo gnyis spyi mas gcig gis dug zos 'chi //
T02D2445:75a-23: rma can gcig gis sbal pa'i tshang rnams 'drul //
T02D2445:75a-24: mig skyon ma byang zla ba gnyis su snang //
T02D2445:75a-25: grib ma ma dgra ru mthong bas skyabs gnas rnyed mi 'gyur //
T02D2445:75a-28: // / mtsho kunda li dung skyong gi gnas su mkha'
T02D2445:75a-29: 'gro ma rma bya'i gdong can gyis rtogs pa'i brda
T02D2445:75a-30: brjod pa / skyar mo nya med bya gzhan gyis mi 'tshe //
T02D2445:75a-31: dug gi nus pa sngags kyis zin dus ltor //
T02D2445:75a-32: rma bya sman bor 'jo sgeg rang la lta //
T02D2445:75a-33: mgo bcad ta la'i shul der myu gu stong //
T02D2445:75a-36: // / byang chub shing gi rtsar mkha' 'gro ma dga'
T02D2445:75a-37: ldan gser gyi 'od can mas rtogs pa'i brda brjod
T02D2445:75a-38: pa / til mar nang nas bton pa'i gso ras me yi rgyu //
T02D2445:75a-39: sgyu ma'i bu yis rgyal po'i gdung mi sobs //
T02D2445:75a-40: ri dags lte ba'i dri ni rgyu nyid dri //
T02D2445:75a-41: mdza' bos bslus tshe grogs la yid ches stor //
T02D2445:75a-44: // / phyag rgya chen po brda'i man ngag las rgyan
T02D2445:75a-45: rnam par bkod pa'i dum bu mkha' 'gro ma mdang
T02D2445:75a-46: sa ldan gser gyi ral pa can gyis bsdus so
T02D2445:75a-47: // dpal ldan gru 'dzin gyi ri bo la mkha'
T02D2445:75a-48: 'gro ma 'khor lo gdong gis rtogs pa'i brda brjod
T02D2445:75a-49: // pa / drang srong gdan du ku sha bzang bas rtsva gzhan spang //
T02D2445:75a-50: zhing pa sa bon nam zin dus su sems ngal so //
T02D2445:75b-0: rlung @75b gis ma bskyod mar me rang khar gsal //
T02D2445:75b-1: yid gcugs bu dang bral na gzhan mi dran //
T02D2445:75b-4: // / dpal ldan nor bu'i gling du mkha' 'gro ma
T02D2445:75b-5: nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa
T02D2445:75b-6: / skye bo blo chung don de rang gis //
T02D2445:75b-7: dam du bcings pa'i khong 'khril grol na bde //
T02D2445:75b-8: dngul dkar me long 'phrul gyi gdan la 'phyi //
T02D2445:75b-9: 'phang gi slob dpon gam nas rgyang du bsring //
T02D2445:75b-12: // / lho phyogs aa su ra'i phug par mkha' 'gro
T02D2445:75b-13: ma nor bu'i spyan ldan mas rtogs pa'i brda brjod
T02D2445:75b-14: pa / khar gzhong nang gi rus sbal nyi ma'i 'dol dga' //
T02D2445:75b-15: gser las byas pa'i rgyan ni gser nyid yin //
T02D2445:75b-16: 'ben la mda' brdeg dpag chen gzhan mi dran //
T02D2445:75b-17: bu ram gzugs rnams ro la tha mi dad //
T02D2445:75b-20: // / nags tshal dra ba can gyi mthongs su mkha'
T02D2445:75b-21: 'gro ma ti ro zan mas rtogs pa'i brda brjod
T02D2445:75b-22: pa / chu shel zla ba yar ngo gcig la 'phel //
T02D2445:75b-23: mkha' la 'ja' yi kha dog ngo bos dben //
T02D2445:75b-24: gzhon nu'i bde ba sus kyang brjod ma shes //
T02D2445:75b-25: til mar gyis blud ral gris bcad tshad 'gyel //
T02D2445:75b-28: // / grong khyer ser skya'i ljongs su mkha' 'gro ma
T02D2445:75b-29: pur sna khyung gshog can gyis rtogs pa'i brda brjod
T02D2445:75b-30: pa / khur bar chu blugs khong gi gtam rnams 'gags//
T02D2445:75b-31: sgyu ma'i ltad mo yang dag ma yin no //
T02D2445:75b-32: dbul mo gter dang phrad tshe sngar rtog bral //
T02D2445:75b-33: lan tshva'i rdog po chu bo nyid la thim //
T02D2445:75b-36: // / dur khrod bsil ba'i tshal du mkha' 'gro ma nyi ma'i phreng bas rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa /
T02D2445:75b-37: wa yi skad la seng ge dang nga skrag skyes //
T02D2445:75b-38: btsun mo rin chen bran mo la mi 'jigs //
T02D2445:75b-39: dgra ru bu langs mdza' bo su la bya //
T02D2445:75b-40: lkugs ma'i rmi lam khar mi 'don par 'dug //
T02D2445:75b-43: // / lho phyogs dpal gyi ril mkha' 'gro ma gtsug
T02D2445:75b-44: na mu tig 'chang gis rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa
T02D2445:75b-45: / bag ma dang ni smyon pa'i spyod pa 'dzol //
T02D2445:75b-46: rgya mtsho'i chu la nya ni rang byan tshud //
T02D2445:75b-47: rgya skyegs ri la me shor rlung rnams grogs //
T02D2445:75b-48: chu rnams 'bab sa na ni ro gcig go //
T02D2445:75b-51: // / ma ga dh'a rgyal po'i khab tu mkha' 'gro
T02D2445:75b-52: ma bdud rtsi bum 'dzin mas rtogs pa'i brda brjod
T02D2445:75b-53: pa / ce spyang rol chags pa'i blo ni skye mo 'gyur //
T02D2445:76a-1: khra yi rtsa la ni gzhan du min //
T02D2445:76a-2: wa yi 'gro 'dug dur khrod nang du gzhol ba yin //
T02D2445:76a-3: bu chung dang ni me long seng ge ltos //
T02D2445:76a-6: // / shar phyogs bi kra ma sha'i la'i gtsug lag
T02D2445:76a-7: khang du mkha' 'gro ma tshe ldan rgyan mas rtogs
T02D2445:76a-9: chu tshad dus su la ko rangs zin //
T02D2445:76a-10: nyi ma'i snying po mun pas gos ma yin //
T02D2445:76a-11: lag pa chad pa'i bzo mkhan bya ba rdugs //
T02D2445:76a-12: dkar nag yi ges mkha' la gos pa min //
T02D2445:76a-15: // / klu gtsug na rin chen gyi yul du mkha'
T02D2445:76a-16: 'gro ma seng ge'i gdong ba can mas rtogs pa'i
T02D2445:76a-17: brda brjod pa / sgong mkha' la skyes pa'i tshang yang de nyid do //
T02D2445:76a-18: khu rta'i sgyu ma bu sa la nams kyang min //
T02D2445:76a-19: nam mkha'i kha dog ma 'gags rnam par dag / na bun sa la langs nas mkha' la thim //
T02D2445:76a-22: // / shing 'dzam bu bri ksha'i grib ma la mkha'
T02D2445:76a-23: 'gro ma 'byung gnas rin chen mas rtogs pa'i brda
T02D2445:76a-24: brjod pa / chu bo sna tshogs rgya mtshor tha dad min //
T02D2445:76a-25: ma dros chu ni gting nas g-yo 'gul bral //
T02D2445:76a-26: chu dang zla ba'i rang bzhin so sor stong //
T02D2445:76a-27: rlan dang rba rlabs rgya mtsho las ma 'das //
T02D2445:76a-30: // / phyag rgya rin po che brda'i man ngag las
T02D2445:76a-31: 'od zer dra ba'i mkha' 'gro ma dpal ldan dbang
T02D2445:76a-32: gi rgyal mos bsdus pa ste gnyis pa'o /
T02D2445:76a-34: // / bde ldan rin chen gling du mkha' 'gro ma
T02D2445:76a-35: zla ba'i 'od zer gyis rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa
T02D2445:76a-36: / dmu rgod dul ba'i spyod pa gzhan pas g-yung //
T02D2445:76a-37: 'bru yi chang rgod bram ze'i btung ba min //
T02D2445:76a-38: lcags kyus zin pa'i glang po rang dbang med //
T02D2445:76a-39: g-ya' ma phyis pa'i me long bzhin mi 'dod //
T02D2445:76a-40: rgyud med gzhu la su yis mda' srid nus //
T02D2445:76a-43: // / thang bzang gser gyi bya skyibs can du mkha'
T02D2445:76a-44: 'gro ma rgya mtsho mig gis rtogs pa'i brda brjod
T02D2445:76a-45: pa / chol zangs nang du sbrang rtsi'i g-yos mi bya //
T02D2445:76a-46: smin pa'i sa bon ser dang ldan la gdab//
T02D2445:76a-47: bud med bsnol 'tshang khyo la smra mi phod //
T02D2445:76a-48: rdzas mtshogs pa'i srub mas me mi thon //
T02D2445:76a-49: til sbyangs zhabs med nang du til mi ldugs //
T02D2445:76a-52: // / nub phyogs plaksha'i tshal du mkha' 'gro ma bi za gzugs 'phrog mas rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa /
T02D2445:76b-0: dug sprul mar la blo ldan @76b skye bo 'dzur //
T02D2445:76b-1: rin chen gling 'dod ded dpon gzhan gyis min //
T02D2445:76b-2: dman pa la bsnyen nad pa rang bzo spang //
T02D2445:76b-3: lo stong mun pa sgron me gzhon nus sel //
T02D2445:76b-4: mkhas pa'i rus sbal tsher ma'i khrod rnams spong //
T02D2445:76b-7: // / grong khyer skyid pa'i 'byung gnas su mkha' 'gro
T02D2445:76b-8: ma k'irti thog mtha' can gyis rtogs pa'i brad brjod
T02D2445:76b-9: pa / stobs ldan gyad spyod 'phye bos byar mi rung //
T02D2445:76b-10: chu bran rnams ni rgya mtsho'i nang du 'bab //
T02D2445:76b-11: rngon pa gling bu ri dags ngos der 'bud //
T02D2445:76b-12: me shel 'od ni ras kyi bal la tsha //
T02D2445:76b-13: zangs kyi mdog ni gser 'gyur rtsi yis 'gyur //
T02D2445:76b-16: // / dur khrod so sa'i gling du mkha' 'gro ma
T02D2445:76b-17: bde ba'i 'od can gyis rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa
T02D2445:76b-18: / ldum ra'i me tog ljon shing grib las skyes //
T02D2445:76b-19: khab len rdo yis lcags rnams dbang du sdud //
T02D2445:76b-20: tshong pa rang gi rigs la 'jug par 'gyur //
T02D2445:76b-21: spre'u'i rten ni 'bras bu can gyi nags //
T02D2445:76b-22: gru btsas len pa rgya mtsho sgrol la brtson //
T02D2445:76b-25: // / shing rtsi tra pa la'i grib ma la mkha'
T02D2445:76b-26: 'gro ma blo gros gser gyi gdu bu can gyis
T02D2445:76b-28: chu mthong rus sbal skam la bsdad mi rigs //
T02D2445:76b-29: dug mda'i rma la le lo byas pas phung //
T02D2445:76b-30: phag gis gtsang btsog med par kha ru bcug / dur khrod nang du ce spyang rol brel //
T02D2445:76b-31: ri yi su la la seng ge 'jigs pa med //
T02D2445:76b-34: // / rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du mkha' 'gro
T02D2445:76b-35: ma bde ba bzang mos rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa
T02D2445:76b-36: / bung ba rtsi 'jib autpala mdog mi nyams //
T02D2445:76b-37: char ni rdo sol me yi grogs yin no //
T02D2445:76b-38: mun pa'i smag rum nyi zla'i 'od kyis sel //
T02D2445:76b-39: 'bru rnams skye ba tsha sgo med pa'i zhing //
T02D2445:76b-40: 'khor lo med pa'i shing rtags 'gro ma shes //
T02D2445:76b-43: // / phyag rgya chen po brda'i man ngag las ye
T02D2445:76b-44: shes rnam par gzigs pa'i du ma bu mkha' 'gro
T02D2445:76b-45: ma su kha pha las bsdus pa ste gsum pa'o
T02D2445:76b-48: / // / ri bo bya rkang gi steng du mkha' 'gro ma
T02D2445:76b-49: bum pa'i lto can gyis rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa
T02D2445:76b-50: / rigs ngan bu mo rgyal po'i khab tu min //
T02D2445:76b-51: sbrang ma ga pur la 'byol ngan skyugs dri la 'du //
T02D2445:76b-52: bram ze gso sbyong dus su bya gzhan dor //
T02D2445:76b-53: sgeg mo rgyan gyis spras tshe rab tu dga' //
T02D2445:77a-4: // / rgyal po'i khab yangs pa can du mkha' 'gro
T02D2445:77a-5: ma gtsug na nor bus rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa
T02D2445:77a-6: / mi gtsang lud 'di 'bras kyi zhing la phan //
T02D2445:77a-7: nad gzir skyes bu g-yo med sman pa bsten //
T02D2445:77a-8: rigs ldan ded dpon 'khor la bu bzhin rtse //
T02D2445:77a-9: chu bran gling la nor bu yod ma yin //
T02D2445:77a-10: sbrang ma rtsi yi nus pa grogs kyis 'gyur //
T02D2445:77a-13: // / dharma gha na r'a dza chos kyi mdzod du
T02D2445:77a-14: mkha' 'gro ma 'bar ma dpal gyi phreng mas rtogs
T02D2445:77a-16: 'dzam bu'i gser la mgar bas 'dod dug bsgyur //
T02D2445:77a-17: phye le ba nya dang bung ba lcags kyus phung //
T02D2445:77a-18: gso bya'i dus der nad pas le lo spang //
T02D2445:77a-19: ma yis bu la brtse pa'i sems mi gtong //
T02D2445:77a-20: rin chen gling du khrid pa'i ded dpon mnyes par bya //
T02D2445:77a-23: // / klu'i rgyal bo ae na ya'i gnas su mkha'
T02D2445:77a-24: 'gro ma khyung gi gdong pa can gyis rtogs pa'i
T02D2445:77a-25: brda brjod pa / dug sprul mche ba gdags pa'i rgyan ma yin //
T02D2445:77a-26: bde dang bral ba btson rang chud pa'i mi //
T02D2445:77a-27: ha la'i me tog mtshar ba'i dor ma thu //
T02D2445:77a-28: bang mdzod rku ba'i mi de bag yod ldan //
T02D2445:77a-29: btung bas gdungs pa'i mi de smig rgyu snyag / gsung ngo /
T02D2445:77a-31: // / phyag rgya chen po brda'i man ngag las sems
T02D2445:77a-32: rnam par dag pa'i dum bu mkha' 'gro ma khyung
T02D2445:77a-33: gdong mas bsdus pa ste bzhi pa'o /
T02D2445:77a-35: // / bya rgod phung po'i ril mkha' 'gro ma gser gyi rgyal mos rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa /
T02D2445:77a-36: 'dam gyi skyon gyis padma la mi gos //
T02D2445:77a-37: gshog ru rgyas tshe byi'u phrug tshang nas 'phur//
T02D2445:77a-38: tsandan mthong ba'i sprul gyis le lo bor //
T02D2445:77a-39: 'dod pa'i gnas der zo chun chu rgyun bsring //
T02D2445:77a-40: mchil pas zin pa'i nya yi bde ba stor //
T02D2445:77a-43: // /'byung po'i grong khyer bi ma la kar mkha' 'gro
T02D2445:77a-44: ma rdo rje 'dam skyes mas rtogs pa'i brda brjod
T02D2445:77a-45: pa / zhing la chu lud rim gyis bsten //
T02D2445:77a-46: pha lam gyis ni mi phigs med //
T02D2445:77a-48: rgya mtshe'i chu la rig byed med //
T02D2445:77a-49: mun pas ma zin nyi ma'i 'od //
T02D2445:77a-51: / shar phyogs zangs kyi dung rgad kyi nang du
T02D2445:77a-52: mkha' 'gro ma dpal ldan 'jigs med mas rtogs pa'i
T02D2445:77b-0: brda brjod pa / nags la @77b brten bca' drang srong rgyab tu shing lo gon //
T02D2445:77b-1: gangs pa gnas pa'i seng ge yang bral nas 'dug
T02D2445:77b-2: / khyung phrug gshog ru rgyas tshe rten med mkha'
T02D2445:77b-3: la lding // sa 'dzin myu gus 'bras bu rang chas 'grub //
T02D2445:77b-4: gdol pa'i bu de 'phyor yang rang mthong zhig / gsung ngo /
T02D2445:77b-6: // / shar phyogs k'a ma r'u ru 'phags pa rang
T02D2445:77b-7: byung gi rtsa ra mkha' 'gro ma 'khor lo shugs
T02D2445:77b-8: 'chang mas rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa /
T02D2445:77b-9: bram ze'i skud pa thog mar bsgrims nas glod //
T02D2445:77b-10: gso ras mkhan mos zla ba gcig nas glod //
T02D2445:77b-11: zhun la bab pa'i gser mgar yangs dang bral //
T02D2445:77b-12: gdan gyi steng du rgyal pos bag gzhi phab //
T02D2445:77b-13: dmus long mig phye snang ba gzigs mor che //
T02D2445:77b-16: // / mchod rten dpal dbyangs kyi rtsar mkha' 'gro ma
T02D2445:77b-17: gtum mo gser mig mas rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa
T02D2445:77b-18: / bram ze'i rig byed gsang tshig bu la ston //
T02D2445:77b-19: rmi lam sdug bsngal dpa'i dus der dag / mang po'i khrod der mi ngo shes pa nyung //
T02D2445:77b-20: rgyu yis ma skyes nam mkha' gdong nas dag / til mar ngar btags ngar kyang snum gyis 'phyi //
T02D2445:77b-21: mda' ru ltor zos sa gzhi gser du mthong //
T02D2445:77b-24: // / byang phyogs 'dam bu'i khrod du bde ldan 'od
T02D2445:77b-25: kyi gnas su mkha' 'gro ma nyi ma'i gshog pa
T02D2445:77b-26: can gyis rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa /
T02D2445:77b-27: bram ze'i rig byed gsang tshig bu la ston //
T02D2445:77b-28: rgyal po'i pho brang rigs ngan gyis ma mthong //
T02D2445:77b-29: srang ka'i kham phor bya ba zin nas 'dug / dug gsum dag na dmus long bris mkhan med //
T02D2445:77b-30: nor bu'i brtag pa blun pos shes pa min //
T02D2445:77b-33: // / rdzing bu padma'i mdangs can gyi 'gram du mkha'
T02D2445:77b-34: 'gro ma rdo rje bsnyems mas rtogs pa'i brda brjod
T02D2445:77b-35: pa / rva med gser la rtog pas gzon mi nus //
T02D2445:77b-36: rin chen gling na gram gseg gyo dum med //
T02D2445:77b-37: dus kyi rkyen gyis padma rgyas par 'gyur //
T02D2445:77b-38: tshangs pa'i lus ni ma bkrus dri ma dag / gsung ngo /
T02D2445:77b-40: // / dha na ko sha'i gling du mkha' 'gro ma
T02D2445:77b-41: rin chen thod 'dzin mas rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa
T02D2445:77b-42: / dgra med mi la bsu bskyal bya mi dgos //
T02D2445:77b-43: ka la pingka'i gshog ru sgo ngar rgyas //
T02D2445:77b-44: padma'i kha ni nyi ma'i zer gyis 'byed //
T02D2445:78a-0: @78a * // chu dang rlan ni gnyis su mi snang ngo //
T02D2445:78a-3: // / sing ga la'i tshal du mkha' 'gro ma nyi
T02D2445:78a-4: ma'i zhags pa can gyis rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa
T02D2445:78a-5: / rmi lam ltad mo su yis byas pa yin //
T02D2445:78a-6: brang chab med pa'i bu mo brjed ngas che //
T02D2445:78a-7: bskyed bsrung la brtson 'bras bu mi len blun //
T02D2445:78a-8: nam mkha'i chu ni smin pa'i rgun 'brum 'bar //
T02D2445:78a-11: // / dur khrod chen po sgra sgrogs su mkha' 'gro
T02D2445:78a-12: ma rdo rje dung can mas rtogs pa'i brda brjod
T02D2445:78a-13: pa / lha khang nang du dmus longs ltad mo nub //
T02D2445:78a-14: ji srid shing yod par du de srid me //
T02D2445:78a-15: sos ka'i chab rom gzhi la stong mi srid //
T02D2445:78a-16: sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'khrul la rtog pa bral //
T02D2445:78a-17: nor bu'i yon tan sus kyang byin pa med //
T02D2445:78a-18: bskal pa ma zhig nyi zla'i 'od mi 'gag / khong sran ma byang gyad la sgyu rtsal med //
T02D2445:78a-19: rgya mtshor bor ba'i chu thigs skam mi 'gyur //
T02D2445:78a-22: // / dpal shr'i na len dra'i gtsug lag khang du
T02D2445:78a-23: mkha' 'gro ma rin chen 'od gsal mas rtogs pa'i
T02D2445:78a-24: brda brjod pa / smyon pa'i mig gis nya dang stong mi mthong //
T02D2445:78a-25: rlan med sbyin la 'byar ba'i nus pa med //
T02D2445:78a-26: skyes bu med pa'i lcags kyus glang me zin //
T02D2445:78a-27: thod le kor gyis nam mkha' mtshon mi nus //
T02D2445:78a-30: // / phyag rgya chen po brda'i man ngag las dpal
T02D2445:78a-31: gyi thugs rnam par bkod pa'i dum bu mkha' 'gro
T02D2445:78a-32: ma rin chen gcig mas bsdus pa ste lnga pa'o
T02D2445:78a-34: / // / rgya mtsho gser gyi gling du mkha' 'gro ma
T02D2445:78a-35: rdo rje bu gcig mas rtogs pa'i rda brjod pa
T02D2445:78a-36: / shing rta dang ni 'khor lo 'bral mi bya //
T02D2445:78a-37: dug sprul dgra ru sgo nga ldang bar 'gyur //
T02D2445:78a-38: 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser ni dngul gyis ldang //
T02D2445:78a-39: glang po dul tshe snying la yi ge 'jug / gsung ngo /
T02D2445:78a-41: // / nub phyogs bi ra'i tshal du mkha' 'gro ma
T02D2445:78a-42: sha za dpal 'dzin mas rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa
T02D2445:78a-43: / ge sar steng du 'dab ma gdan du gding //
T02D2445:78a-44: thar pa 'dod pas khyab 'jug mig la blta //
T02D2445:78a-45: stobs dang ldan pas gser 'gyur rtsi mchog ni //
T02D2445:78a-46: de ring banda'i drin las rab tu rnyed //
T02D2445:78a-49: // / dur khrod rab dga'i nang du mkha' 'gro ma
T02D2445:78a-50: nor bu'i 'od can gyis rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa
T02D2445:78a-51: / grang ba'i nad la ga bur bsten mi bya //
T02D2445:78b-0: tshangs @78b pa'i yi ge smra ru ma btub po //
T02D2445:78b-1: gi wang zad pa'i glang po sgrog las thar //
T02D2445:78b-2: dngul chu'i nus pa lha dbang mig la phan //
T02D2445:78b-5: // / shar phyogs khar sa p'a ni'i gtsug lag khang
T02D2445:78b-6: du mkha' 'gro ma bu ta ro zan mas rtogs
T02D2445:78b-8: sbrul sngags shes pa'i nad la dug mi tshugs //
T02D2445:78b-9: 'chi ba'i dus der rgyal srid ci zhig bya //
T02D2445:78b-10: sna khrid med pa'i long ba gang du 'gro //
T02D2445:78b-11: phag gis glang po mtshon te ma mtshon no //
T02D2445:78b-14: // / dur khrod ma h'a k'a la'i dbus su mkha'
T02D2445:78b-15: 'gro ma dpal gyi phreng ba can gyis rtogs pa'i
T02D2445:78b-16: brda brjod pa / rmi lam ltad mo rang gi sems la byas //
T02D2445:78b-17: me ni spra pa dag la rab tu 'bar //
T02D2445:78b-18: yi ge gcig gis rig byed kun la 'jug / rig byed kun gyis yi ge gcig ma shes //
T02D2445:78b-21: // / b'a r'a na s'ir mkha' 'gro ma 'bar ma gser dril can gyis rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa /
T02D2445:78b-22: sngo gzhan dang ni gser 'gyur tsi mi 'dra //
T02D2445:78b-23: nya rgyas zla bas shel la chu rgyun 'dzag / sbu ba'i chu rgyun rgya mtsho rang la thim //
T02D2445:78b-24: mkhas pa ba lang skyong ba drag shul 'dor //
T02D2445:78b-27: // / chu mig mda' chu khron pa skyes pa'i rtsar
T02D2445:78b-28: mkha' 'gro ma 'bar ma gser dril can gyis rtogs
T02D2445:78b-30: ri brags pas mtha' dben pa'i gnas ma yin //
T02D2445:78b-31: rgyal po'i pho brang tshong 'dus rab tu 'gol //
T02D2445:78b-32: byad ni me long rgyab tu blta mi bya //
T02D2445:78b-33: snag tsha byi ba'i yi ge snying gis klag / gsung ngo /
T02D2445:78b-35: // / glang po ljongs kyi grong khyer du mkha' 'gro
T02D2445:78b-36: ma khrag sna rgyal mos rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa
T02D2445:78b-37: / nam mkha'i yid can mkha' las 'phags ma nus //
T02D2445:78b-38: drang srong rgyal mtshan thar pa'i lam ma yin //
T02D2445:78b-39: dkyil 'khor gyis kyang mya ngan las mi 'da' //
T02D2445:78b-40: 'bras bu mchog ni smyon pa'i sems las btsal //
T02D2445:78b-43: // / byang phyogs sman gyi nags su mkha' 'gro ma
T02D2445:78b-44: gtsug na rgyan gro la mas rtogs pa'i brda brjod
T02D2445:78b-45: pa / phag rgod mgo bo rdog pas mnan pa'i mi //
T02D2445:78b-46: skyes bu de yis gdams dag thams cad bstan //
T02D2445:78b-47: ded dpon bu yis nam mkha'i yi ge klag / grogs dag 'di yi zhabs la 'dud par rigs //
T02D2445:79a-0: // / dpal 'bras phung du mkha' 'gro ma dpal ldan gru 'dzin mas rtogs @79a * //
T02D2445:79a-2: rdza yi 'khor lo srub thag ma then par //
T02D2445:79a-3: nor bu rin chen 'di la mchod par bya //
T02D2445:79a-4: glang po smyon pa 'tshong ba'i mi de mkhas //
T02D2445:79a-5: gter mthong nas ni 'byol bar mi bya'o //
T02D2445:79a-8: // / mchod rten rnam dag gi rtsar dpal rang byung gi rgyal mos rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa /
T02D2445:79a-9: kye ho bu rnams seng ge'i 'o ma 'thung //
T02D2445:79a-10: phan pa'i sman mar phyi ru ma skyug cig / snying gi dbus su nyi ma shar nas su //
T02D2445:79a-11: mun pa'i tshogs rnams rab tu 'joms par 'gyur //
T02D2445:79a-14: // / phyag rgya chen po brda'i man nga las las
T02D2445:79a-15: rnam par grol ba'i dum bu mkha' 'gro ma dpal
T02D2445:79a-16: ldan padma'i spyan gyis bsdus pa ste dum bu drug
T02D2445:79a-18: / le phran lnga bcu rtsa lnga pa phyag rgya
T02D2445:79a-19: rin po che brda'i man ngag rje dam pa la
